classes.name: CbcEventHandler
classes.brief:
.NET wrapper for CBC event handling

CbcEvent enum (node, solution, treeStatus, endSearch, etc.) and
CbcAction enum (noAction, stop, restart, killSolution).
CbcDelegateEventHandlerProxy bridges .NET delegates to native callbacks.

classes.name: CbcModel
classes.brief:
.NET wrapper for CbcModel (COIN-OR Branch and Cut)

C++/CLI wrapper exposing CBC MIP solver to .NET languages.
Wraps branch-and-bound with cut generation capabilities.

classes.name: CbcSolver
classes.brief:
.NET wrapper for CBC solver entry points (CbcMain0/CbcMain1)

C++/CLI wrapper for CBC solver with callback support.
CbcSolverCallBack delegate for monitoring solve phases.

classes.name: CglCutGenerator
classes.brief:
.NET wrapper for CglCutGenerator (cut generator base class)

C++/CLI wrapper exposing CGL cut generators to .NET languages.
Generic template CglCutGeneratorGeneric<T> for derived generators.

classes.name: ClpModel
classes.brief:
.NET wrapper for ClpModel (COIN-OR LP solver)

C++/CLI wrapper exposing CLP simplex solver to .NET languages.
Supports quadratic objectives via loadQuadraticObjective().

classes.name: CoinMessageHandler
classes.brief:
.NET wrapper for CoinMessageHandler (logging)

C++/CLI wrapper for COIN-OR logging infrastructure.
CoinMessageHandlerProxy bridges .NET virtual methods to native callbacks.
CoinOneMessage and CoinMessages for custom message definitions.

classes.name: CoinMpsIO
classes.brief:
.NET wrapper for CoinMpsIO (MPS file I/O)

C++/CLI wrapper for reading LP problems from MPS format files.
Exposes row/column bounds, objective coefficients, and matrix data.

classes.name: CoinPackedMatrix
classes.brief:
.NET wrapper for CoinPackedMatrix (sparse matrix)

C++/CLI wrapper exposing CoinUtils sparse matrix to .NET languages.

classes.name: Helpers
classes.brief:
Core wrapper infrastructure for Sonnet .NET bindings

Template base classes for C++/CLI wrappers around native COIN-OR objects.
WrapperAbstractBase<T> and WrapperBase<T> handle ownership and lifetime.

classes.name: OsiCbcSolverInterface
classes.brief:
.NET wrapper for OsiCbcSolverInterface (CBC via OSI)

C++/CLI wrapper exposing CBC MIP solver through OSI interface.
Provides access to CbcModel for node count, strategy, and solution.

classes.name: OsiClpSolverInterface
classes.brief:
.NET wrapper for OsiClpSolverInterface (CLP via OSI)

C++/CLI wrapper exposing CLP solver through OSI interface to .NET.
Includes matrix access methods and optional CPLEX/Gurobi support.

classes.name: OsiSolverInterface
classes.brief:
.NET wrapper for OsiSolverInterface (Open Solver Interface)

C++/CLI wrapper exposing OsiSolverInterface to .NET languages.
